page.title: 12Events :Kington Festival
page.content: Kington Festival is run by the Lions. They organise a Gala Day which involves wearing fancy dress, floats through the town, a wheelbarrow race, a four legged race, pram race, Offa's Dyke race and "It's a Knockout" where teams from different pubs, who are given champagne for competing, compete in games. The winning team also receives a shield. There is a race where, by paying 50p, you get a number which is floated down the River Arrow, then the first number to reach a certain place wins Â£100. In the Wheelbarrow Race each person,in fancy dress, pushes a barrow, in which the partener sits, through Kington. They stop at each pub and each team drinks \ pint of beer between them. In the Four Legged Race three people with legs tied and in fancy dress run from the clock to{(cont on next page)
